item.title: Linux JDK一键安装脚本
item.description: bash <(curl -Ssl https://picture-czy.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/shareFile/jdk-install.sh) 下载不了的话，运行下面脚本 #!/bin/bash set -e java_dist="/root/jdk-8u202-linux-x64.tar.gz" default_java_dir="/usr/local" java_dir="$default_java_dir" SUDO_USER=root function usage() { echo "" echo "这个脚本会自动下载jdk 1.8. " echo "Usage: " echo "install-java.sh -f <java_dist> [-p <java_dir>]" echo "" echo "-f: The jdk tar.gz file. 默认安装
